caption:
The photograph displays a large, stationary wooden boat supported on stands on land, possibly in a dockyard or display setting. Most notable is the figurehead on the boat's prow, sculpted in the form of a mermaid with detailed facial features, flowing hair, and a traditional mermaid tail, painted in white and holding a position that appears dynamic and forward-moving.

The boat itself has a richly detailed body with a white and orange color scheme. Its name, visible on the hull, is "Storm" and it bears the registration number "CF 0007 BM". The construction features include wooden planking and a sturdy bow. A prominent feature on the deck includes a large crane or mast.

The boat rests on greenish plants that look like they could be succulents, possibly indicating a coastal or arid environment. Behind the boat, an overcast sky suggests a dull or cloudy day, and a faint, blurred background suggests a setting that lacks significant structures or other boats, focusing the viewer's attention primarily on the detailed features of the boat and its figurehead.
title: California -- Monterey Bay
